title: Trump 2024? Aliens Are Our Babysitter? 4.21.21
itunes:title: Trump 2024? Aliens Are Our Babysitter? 4.21.21
description:
In episode 892, Jack and Miles are joined by Me and Paranormal You host and CrystalEyes app co-founder Ryan Singer to discuss Trump very seriously considering a run in 2024, a study on how to get Trump voters to get vaccinated, the police figuring out how to deal with the Derek Chauvin verdict, Britney Spears' BLM instagram post, GOP's outrage over Maxine Waters words, UFOs, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. CrystalEyes App - Identifying Crystals with a Snap Kickstarter
  2. Trump Is ‘Beyond Seriously’ Considering 2024 Presidential Bid
  3. ‘I’m still a zero’: Vaccine-resistant Republicans warn that their skepticism is worsening
  4. Awaiting Derek Chauvin Verdict, Police Prepare New Approach to Protests
  5. BRITNEY SPEARS POSTS SUPPORT FOR BLACK LIVES MATTER ... Some Followers Pissed!!!
  6. Republicans Cower In Fear Of Tiny Octogenarian Congresswoman, Maxine Waters, A Very Bad Lady
  7. The U.S. military takes UFOs seriously. Why doesn't Silicon Valley or academia?
  8. Pentagon officially releases UFO videos
  9. 2 Navy Airmen and an Object That ‘Accelerated Like Nothing I’ve Ever Seen’
  10. SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on UFOs: ‘Think I would know if there were aliens’
  11. Former Navy pilot describes UFO encounter studied by secret Pentagon program
  12. Glowing Auras and ‘Black Money’: The Pentagon’s Mysterious U.F.O. Program
  13. Former Navy pilot describes UFO encounter studied by secret Pentagon program
  14. The Pentagon Released U.F.O. Videos. Don’t Hold Your Breath for a Breakthrough.
  15. Establishment of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena Task Force
  16. Harry Reid Confirms Federal Government Covered Up UFOs For Years
  17. LISTEN: DeeDONTCARE Latin Jungle [Bad N' Heavy]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
